name: 428: Fūsa Sareta Shibuya de
overview: 428: Fuusa Sareta Shibuya de is a visual novel is set in the Shibuya neighborhood of Tokyo, where the story is presented using a combination of scrolling text, still images and live-action video sequences. The title became famous among connoisseurs of the genre, since it was rated a perfect score of 40/40 by the famous magazine Famitsu. In 2018, the game was eventually released to Western audiences under the localized title "428: Shibuya Scramble".
